locality: Mun. Santana do Riacho, Serra do Cipó, encosta oeste. Estrada Santana do Riacho-Lapinha
occurrenceRemarks: Arbusto pouco ramoso, 1,2 m alt. População numerosa, mas localizada (agregada). Folhas glaucas. Pétalas alvas, filetes róseos, anteras púrpuras, apêndice amarelos; hipanto verde claro.

recordedBy: Almeda, Frank; Martins, A. B.; Fritsch, P. W.; Belinello, R.
locality: Minas Gerais: Municipio of Santana do Riacho. Serra do Cipó. Between km 107 and 108 along the road from Lagoa Santa to Conceição do Mato Dentro.
occurrenceRemarks: Shrub 1 m tall. Leaves spreading at nearly a right angle from branchlets. Blades blue-green with a flush of pink. Petals white with transluscent venation. Androecium yellow. The larger anthers with a faint flush of orange.

locality: Serra do Cipo. 9-11 km beyond the Cipo Veraneio Hotel which is adjacent to the bridge over the Rio Cipo
occurrenceRemarks: Strict sparingly branched shrub 0.5- 1 m tall. Flowers both 6-merous and 7-merous. Petals creamy white. Anthers and appendages yellow. Local. Cytological and/or Biochemical Vouchers.

locality: Municipio Santana do Riacho. Serra do Cipó. About 5 km down the road to the Cachoeira and Serra Moreno.
occurrenceRemarks: Openly branched shrub to 1.5 m tall. Leaves glaucous green. Flowers 6- or 7-merous. Petals white with flush of yellow and conspicuous venation. filaments white with flush of pink. Both sets of stamens lavender-pink becoming red. Rostrum white. Appendages yellow. Common.

occurrenceRemarks: Slender shub 1-2.5m tall; leaves glaucous, rather succulent; fruit only; cerrado.

occurrenceRemarks: Strict openly branched shrub to 2 m tall. Leaves glaucous blue-green when fresh. Flowers 7-merous, petals white, anthers and appendages yellow. Locally very common.

occurrenceRemarks: Shrubs to 1 m tall with arching branches. Leaves glaucous green. Flowers 6- or 7-merous. Petals white with yellow flush and darker venation. Filaments white. Both anther sets pinkish. Appendages yellow. Occasional.

occurrenceRemarks: Subarbusto de 60cm até 1,0m alt. Folhas glaucas, hipanto e sépalas creme; pétalas alvas com ápice rosado, filetes e anteras amarelos.
